meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Rich Doyle Angela Lewis John Patlan Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #1364.

td.p: Rich Doyle, a purchasing manager from Simi Valley, California
Angela Lewis, a singer originally from New York City
John Patlan, a social worker from Austin, Texas (whose 2-day cash winnings total $25,202)

tr.td: 19TH CENTURY AMERICA
[The TH was upper case & underlined, about half the size of the 19 and there was space between the underlining and the TH.]
MEDICINE
A.K.A.
4-LETTER WORDS
PIANISTS
THE SOUTHWEST
